notes: 1) 8 years oppression, Othniel for 40 years peace
2) Eglon Moab oppressed 18 years, With Ehud 80 years peace
3) No time of oppression prior, no duration of peace (artificially extended to 1 year)
4) 20 years Jabin of Canaan, chief Sisera, then 40 years peace
5) 7 years oppression Midian, then 40 years peace
6) Abimelech killing his 70 brothers, 3 years, after Tola 23 years peace
7) no prior time, 30 sons on 30 donkeys with 30 cities, peace for 22 years
8) 18 years Philistines and Ammorites, then Jephtah 6 years peace
9) no time prior, with Ibzan (30 sons and 30 daughters) 7 years peace
12) 40 years in hand of Philistines, with Samson 20 years peace
